metadata.title: CVE-2010-3389 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The (1) SAPDatabase and (2) SAPInstance scripts in OCF Resource Agents (akaresource-agents or cluster-agents) 1.0.3 in Linux-HA place a zero-lengthdirectory name in the LD_LIBRARY_PATH, which allows local users to gainprivileges via a Trojan horse shared library in the current workingdirectory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-3389` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cluster-agents - 1:1.0.4-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cluster-agents package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.0.4-0ubuntu1').
